item.description:
*UPDATE*** Parry will be acting as contact for tonight's happy hour. If you have any questions, he can be reached at 203-988-9414

Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Thali Too

Thali Too is the smaller vegetarion-only cousin of one of New Haven's best Indian restaurants, Thali. Based on our recent happy hour at Thali, the ownner/manager has invited the NHC to come and check out their sister restaurant, Thali Too.

We will have the entire outdoor patio reserved for the NHC and the following specials will be offered for the evening.

All Draft Beers - $4.00
Wine - $7.00
Mixed Drinks - $6.00

In addition, there will be a small selection of Thali Too's food for us to sample throughout the evening.

*Note- the restuarant is located in the alley between Barnes and Noble and the Yale Book Store*
Contact info: Jeanie 860-942-4708

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Monday Happy Hour - Thali Too
